title: Senior Mobile iOS Developer - Airline company

what you need to know -

Significant experience working on SaaS solutions, inc. AWS experience
Prior programming experience; deep understanding of networking
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both Hebrew and English
An innovator by nature, proactive, out-of-the-box thinking

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
subTitle: Make My Day
description:
Make My Day is seeking a passionate senior FS developer to lead our growing developments needs for Electric Vehicles as part of the company's growth in today's hottest market in the worlds of Mobility and energy and as part of making our environment greener.

You will be based in our Tel-Aviv office or work remotely and report to the Chief Product Officer (head of technology) and R&D Manager in Tel-Aviv, Israel.

To be successful in this role:

you are an inspiring developer a real leader
have excellent verbal and written communication skills
superior engineering and problem-solving skills
can prioritize, execute and deliver.




Responsibilities:

Develop our core main technology and algorithm
Make product wishes comes true and decisions
Create an Electric Vehcile and Fleet Management software
Work closely with the tech leads, Product Management, the executive team and other stakeholders to understand, help shape, and gain alignment on mission and vision.
Continuously communicate mission and vision throughout the engineering organization to further propagate alignment, motivate and improve productivity
Anticipate challenges and address them proactively
Drive the talent roadmap and make sure we have the right skills at the right time
Effectively balance multiple priorities and ensure efficiency for projects and deliverables
Collaborate closely with the people team and the tech leads to drive performance review and feedback




Requirements:

B.S. or higher degree in a technical field with relevant work experience
4+ years of experience in engineering real coding roles
A proven track record of successfully developing large engineering products with multiple tools and technologies
Excellent oral and written communication skills in English
Expert-level capabilities to dive into technical issues as needed, to provide guidance for strategic decisions and hard problem resolution
Strong project handling skills
Self-motivated, comfortable operating without direct supervision
Deep learning developer with proven Full-Stack execution of multi-tier projects developments
Excellent Web Developer familiar with both Front-End pure vanilla development and sophisticated Back-End server capabilities and multi-modal databases What we offer
High impact position in a profitable and growing company carrying a bold vision for the EV market
Work with top experts in the fields of EV, OEMs, Fleets, ML/AI, coding experts and business management
Competitive compensation package, including equity that has multiplied in value in the past five years and is on a clear path to continue.
Key position with a provider to some of the largest and most impactful organizations worldwide for electric vehicles.







About US

Make My Day, LTD. is a highly profitable and growing provider of the first EV Charging Optimization Algorithm for drivers and Fleets Operators, a hardened platform that helps organizations execute fleet operations and adopt electric vehicles. Make My Day will be used by more than million end users and have been will be installed at more than 25,000 of the world’s leading corporations and fleet operators such as Daimler/Mercedes, Lafarge Holcim, Vokswagen, Chevron and other leading EV, Car and Fleet Operators globally. Our customers operate in an increasingly active regulatory environment with HIPAA, GDPR, CCPA and the likes. Drivers and EV around the world rely on the Make My Day platform to gain the necessary visibility and control over the communication and route planning, dispatching and charging of EV and trucks. Make My Day is carrying its bold vision forward while maintaining strong profitability and growth. This is a perfect time to join the company as it has started to move into a high growth phase and there are many opportunities to make a meaningful contribution to its future.

title: Backend Team Leader
subTitle: Just Eat Takeaway.com
description:
Are you a software expert who enjoys taking on exciting challenges? Want to work with cutting-edge technologies and lead a talented team? Then this role has the right ingredients!




Our story

With over 98 million active users across 25 countries, here at Just Eat Takeaway.com, we’re a global food tech company, connecting our customers from Amsterdam to Auckland with the food they love.

As a growing business, we’re searching for opportunities to perfect our processes and implement methodologies that help our teams to thrive locally and globally. That’s where you come in!




All about the role

As our Full Stack Team Lead, you play a key role in optimizing all of our 10bis.co.il brand interfaces. Interfaces for consumers, business partners, restaurants, and the different operations teams.

You’re responsible for a range of areas, including internal and external APIs, client infrastructure, integrations, and much more.

Your interpersonal skills will also be key, as we’re counting on you to coach, motivate and inspire a development squad of 4-8 team members.

As our team lead, you will also:




Communicate project requirements and specifications to the team
Grow the team by recruiting new members
Create work plans & schedules for software developers
Build robust and scalable software components & services
Identify areas for improvement in our product architecture and design methodologies
Collaborate with team members and a wide range of other stakeholders
Take a flexible, proactive, and analytical approach to your work




Can you deliver…

Ready to take on the role? Here are the skills and background we need from you:

1+ years of experience in managing a Software Development team (4+ members),
5+ years’ experience in a Software Development role
Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Science, Software Engineering or equivalent military experience
Good knowledge of server-side technologies: .NET Framework or .NET Core, Azure, MS SQL
Solid understanding of design patterns, software development techniques, and clean code practices
Strong research, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills
Fluent English (written & spoken) and excellent communication skills




Here is our offer

Here at JET, we offer our colleagues the chance to develop and grow alongside top talent in one of the world’s leading food delivery companies. By providing a creative, dynamic and innovative environment, we empower our people and give them the ingredients for success.

Ready to join us as a Full Stack Team Leader? Click Apply Now and send us your CV!




Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging.

No matter who you are, what you look like, who you love, or where you are from, you can find your place at Just Eat Takeaway.com. We’re committed to creating an inclusive culture, encouraging diversity of people and thinking, in which all employees feel they truly belong and can bring their most colourful selves to work every day.




More about us

Want to know more about our company vision, culture or career growth opportunities? Have a look at our careers site.

title: Head of Design
subTitle: Tango
description:
Tango is a successful, market leader, a live-streaming Platform with 450+ Million registered users, in an industry projected to reach $240 BILLION in the next couple of years.




The B2C platform, based on the best-quality global video technology, allows millions of talented people around the world to create their own live content, engage with their fans and monetize their talents.




Tango live stream was founded in 2018 and is powered by 350+ global employees operating in a culture of growth, learning, and success!




The Tango team is a vigorous cocktail of hard workers, creative brains, energizers, geeks, overachievers, athletes, and more. We push the limits to bring our app from “one of the top” to “the leader”.




The best way to describe Tango's work style is not to use the word “impossible”. And we believe that success is a thorny path that runs on sleepless nights, corporate parties, tough releases, and of course our users' smiles (and as we are a LIVE app, we truly get to see our users all around the world smiling right in front of us in real-time!).




Do you want to join the party?




Responsibilities:

Build and manage a talented team of product designers, that consistently delivers on projects and is well-balanced across a range of design skill sets. Guide creative and holistic thinking across diverse product releases, platforms, and devices.
Deliver a UX strategy, along with a plan for evolutionary, iterative updates that actualize the larger strategy over time. Make sure that design helps to achieve Tango's business goals and the design strategy follows the overall company strategy.
Take part in all brainstorms and product improvements. Be initiative, suggest solutions and find problems.
Communicate with product owners and stakeholders directly and transfer business requests to design team and team feedback back to business.
Use design to go beyond jobs-to-be-done to delight and bring in brand experiences.
Lead with customer obsession, guide towards strong user experience and strategically leverage user research.
Think across all layers of design from systems to interactions, balancing feasibility and compelling experiences. Improve the quality of overall design output by example and through definition of system design thinking for cross experiences within the platform.
Support and build positive and effective communication with other company’s departments.
Supervised of what is happening in marketing designs, synchronization, reviews, marketing assistance.




Requirements:

5+ years of relevant experience in product design and 3+ years of management experience.
Experience leading and scaling product design teams.
Vast experience in digital products: mobile apps, web apps, graphic design.
Excellent hard skills to take the most challenging design tasks by your own.
Excellent soft skills and stress tolerance.
Experience in fast-paced and growing start-up environments, such as product companies, growing startups.
Excellent writing and verbal communication skills in English.
Bonus but no must: experience working in social media or entertainment products.




If this sounds like you, send your cv and help empower live entertainers and creators to build independent businesses around their live talents.

title: Senior software architect - Microsoft Defender for IoT
subTitle: Microsoft
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel\nHybrid
description:
The IoT Security is a new group at Microsoft (including the recent CyberX acquisition) which is responsible for building advanced security solutions to protect IoT services, devices and networks at global scale on top of Azure. The product combines the cutting edge in cloud technology, big data and machine learning with the challenges of the fast-growing market of IoT devices with its large diversity and complexity.

Responsibilities

We are looking for a passionate software architect to lead feature POCs and design and take a leading part in hands-on implementation. Defender for IoT is using cloud software components as well as software component running on Linux based network sensors, on Windows endpoints and on IoT devices. Product is designed to collect large amount of information and analyze it to classify OT/IoT devices running on the network and detect security threats. Product is part of Microsoft security offering and is highly integrated with other Microsoft security products. Development group has full ownership over end-to-end data pipelines, micro services, RESTful APIs and React frontend. You should be hands-on and have strong design, coding, debugging skills and in-depth knowledge of OOD cloud architecture and cloud development methods. Knowledge in security and networking is a great advantage.

Qualifications

Qualifications

7+ years of hands-on experience working on design and architecture at scale
7+ years of commercial OOD software development experience using C# or similar
5+ years of experience in cloud architecture, development, deployment and monitoring
Proven experience in creating and delivering enterprise grade products
BSc degree or higher in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering or equivalent
Demonstrated ability of leading by influencing and working effectively cross-group
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Hebrew, including communication with executives, developers, and Product Managers

Advantages

Strong problem solving and debugging skills.
Experience in Azure and Microsoft development and deployment tools
Understanding of computer networks and protocols
Passion for security and experience with developing security applications

Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.

Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.

#ILDC-IOT

Transmit Security gives businesses the modern tools they need to build secure, trusted and end-to-end digital identity journeys to innovate and grow. CX-focused, cybersecurity conscious leaders rely on Transmit Security’s xCIAM platform to provide their customers with smooth experiences protected from fraud across all channels and devices.

Transmit Security serves many of the world’s largest banks, insurers, retailers, and other leading brands, collectively responsible for more than $1.3 trillion in annual commerce. For more information, please visit www.transmitsecurity.com.

Our group of enthusiastic highly professional engineers is growing and we are looking for a full stack team lead that will take ownership over building an innovative product in the area of User Management as a service. The product will govern, collect, analyze, and securely store data in scale for hundreds of millions of users worldwide.

We are an API first company that strives to offload the work of handling user data in consumer oriented organizations.

title: Frontend Engineer
subTitle: Wix
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
description:
We Are

Wix’s Frontend Engineering Guild. Our mission is to develop products and technologies that empower any person in the world to thrive online. We bring extraordinary client-facing solutions to more than 200M people and businesses - and their customers - in over 30 different product lines. These include ecommerce, payments, blog, booking platforms, restaurants, media, customer development solutions and more.

As an industry leading engineering group, we’re pushing the boundaries of web development to its limits. We build complex micro-frontends with extremely scalable and resilient architectures, which combine into innovative applications running in our customers’ browsers.

Our engineering culture embraces cutting-edge technologies, TDD and clean code. We work in small teams, follow agile work methods and use continuous integration and continuous delivery methodologies to run quickly. Our goal is to maintain the highest standards of development, while having fun doing so. And, we love sharing knowledge and contributing back to the open source community.

You Are

A talented frontend developer with at least 5 years’ experience working on client-side development, on large scales. You’re an expert on the latest JavaScript technologies (React, Angular, Vue, etc), tools (Babel, Webpack/Rollup/Parcel) and languages (Typescript, ES6+).

You always love to learn more, are able to work independently and you love sharing knowledge and best practices. Got experience in Test Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Delivery? That’s a bonus!

As a Senior Frontend Developer, You Will

Work on cutting-edge technologies that make a powerful impact on over 200 million users
Tackle tough problems and find creative ways to solve them
Write (a lot) of high-quality, functional Javascript. Additionally, you’ll work with Git, Node.js, React, Redux, MobX and ES6+
Push your code to millions of users every day
Invest your time in personal growth, as part of the Frontend Guild at Wix
Manage and complete tasks using TDD, continuous integration and modern development processes


About Wix

With over 30 different products, Wix makes it easy for anyone to succeed online. We build web creation tools and business solutions, mobile apps, payment processing technologies, as well as CRM and marketing tools that help our users in different business sectors and compete online. Our technologies are based on massive infrastructure required to securely and resiliently serve over 220 million users, and their visitors across the globe - instantly. Our scale is enormous, and our plans for the future are even bigger.

Wix’s product development teams work in a dev-centric culture, deploy code hundreds of times every day using advanced automation tools, and create methodologies that enable a fast-to-production environment. We operate in small highly-collaborative teams, but belong to professional groups called guilds, dedicated to personal and professional growth.

We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Wix was built around the idea that everyone has the right to be successful, online. This same vision defines us as an employer: creating a work environment where everyone is welcome, and anyone has the right to succeed.

title: Principal Backend Engineer R&D
subTitle: Axonius
description:
Axonius is the cybersecurity asset management platform that gives organizations a comprehensive asset inventory, uncovers gaps, and automatically validates and enforces policies. Deployed in minutes, the Axonius cyber asset attack surface management (CAASM) solution integrates with hundreds of data sources to give customers the confidence to control complexity by mitigating threats, navigating risk, decreasing incidents, automating response actions, and informing business-level strategy. Hundreds of customers worldwide like The New York Times, Schneider Electric, and AB InBev trust Axonius to control complexity.




Headquartered in New York, New York, Axonius employs over 600 people worldwide and achieved unicorn status in early 2021. Axonius has been recognized with the Great Place to Work Certification™, was named one of Fortune’s 2021 Best Small and Medium Workplaces™, and was named to Dun’s Best Start Up Companies to Work for Over 100 Employees. Most recently, Axonius was also named to the 2021 and 2022 Forbes Cloud 100 list of the top 100 private SaaS companies in the world, as well as named to Inc. magazine's 2022 Best Workplaces and has been cited as the fastest growing cybersecurity company in history by revenue.

We are growing rapidly and are looking for superstars to join our rocket ship.




Responsibilities:




Take a leading part in building and architecting the Axonius product
Research solutions for challenging problems
Architectural and technological research
Working with a team of top-tier engineers to solve hard problems and scale the product




Requirements:




At least 6 years as a backend developer
In-depth experience with high scale production systems
Highly experienced with Python
Understanding of fundamental design principles for building a scalable application
Experience with MongoDB
Background in Cybersecurity
Deep understanding of networks
Can-do approach




A little more about Axonius:




We are a remote-first culture. We have offices in New York and in Tel Aviv, but the majority of our employees are working from home across the US and Internationally.
Our people aren’t just great professionals, they are great people. We are all here to support each other, ready to help and do what’s best for the entire company.
Focus on Career growth. We love seeing our people grow into new roles and work hard to ensure everyone sees and can realize a long term career path here at Axonius.




At Axonius we support a diverse and inclusive workplace and believe in equal employment opportunity. We welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives, regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, age, sex, gender identity, national origin, sexual orientation, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status.

title: R&D Team leader
subTitle: Yotpo
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel\nHybrid
description:
If you shop online (and who doesn’t these days?), then chances are you’ve already interacted with Yotpo. We’re a leading eCommerce marketing platform, on a mission to help brands of all sizes accelerate their growth through exceptional customer experiences. Loyalty programs, SMS marketing, reviews, and visual user-generated content are our bread and butter, but we have more solutions up our sleeve, too.

We have teams across the world, including the US, UK, Israel, Bulgaria, and Australia — and we’re still growing. Our primary goal is to deliver the best technology in the industry.

You can hear all about it in our latest brand video.

Sounds exciting? Then read on, because we’re in pursuit of the best and the brightest minds to help us achieve our vision.

We are building a new product line, with a startup-within-a-startup philosophy, and are looking for a Full-Stack Team Lead that can lead the execution of a top-notch product from start to end.

This is a great opportunity to join a product in its early stages, having a huge impact on decisions, tech stack, processes and more. We are working at a high pace and solving every challenge we encounter to get our customers the best experience while leveraging the tools, infrastructure and scale Yotpo can offer. We are lean, and believe in speed and incremental workflows. To be successful we must be focused, professional, and work together effectively, and most importantly - enjoy our day-to-day while achieving our goals.

As a team lead you’ll be responsible for the team success, its deliverables, all while everyone enjoys the ride. You’ll hire, mentor, educate, and deploy processes autonomously to make your team best-in-class.

Our Technologies: Java, Kafka, Angular, Vue.js, MySql, k8s, Redis, Spark and more

What we offer:

A constantly growing environment and meaningful, high-impact work
All the tools, training, and support you need for success
A great team of people who are passionate about technology and eCommerce
An innovative culture that fuels personal growth


You’ll be:

Delivering scalable features daily in CI/CD environment
Participating and leading the design of complex solutions
Working closely with Product, Design, Operations, Client Services, and more
Collaborating with team members on technological and architectural topics
Owning your work with freedom & responsibility culture


Your experience:

A BSc in computer science/engineering (or equivalent)
5+ years of experience in software development including 2+ years as R&D Team Leader
Experience with client-side frameworks like Angular/React/Vue.js (advantage)
Experience with backend Java Spring boot (advantage)


We will happily consider candidates whose experience doesn't match our specific technologies.

title: Senior Product Designer (UX/UI)
subTitle: Anchor
description:
Anchor is looking for our first in-house Senior Product Designer to join our team and help build Anchor’s user experience and the UX/UI departments from the ground up.

For this role, we're looking for someone who enjoys complex systems, has a passion for building infrastructure, and strategies, and creates a product designer culture.

Join us at Anchor and help us make our customers’ lives easier!




Responsibilities:

Collaborate with product managers, engineers, and cross-functional stakeholders to understand requirements, and provide creative, thoughtful solutions.
Communicate the user experience at various stages of the design process with wireframes, flow diagrams, storyboards, mockups, and/or high-fidelity prototypes.
Integrate user feedback and business requirements into ongoing product experience updates.
Advocate for the prioritization of design-centered changes, refinements, and improvements based on user feedback and data.
Take the company-wide ownership of Designing UI and UX for all of the company’s products across Web & Mobile.
Improve and create clever and easy user experiences for onboarding, product activation, and key user flows with simplicity and elegance as the cornerstone.
Own the development of Anchor's design system.




Requirements:

At least 4 years of UX/UI design experience in a SaaS environment, ideally working in an international B2B / B2C / B2B2C company.
A deep understanding of UX principles based on behavioral psychology, cognitive biases, and visual perception. You rely on methodology – not just intuition.
End to End accountability and ownership of tasks.
An exceptional portfolio demonstrating strong product and visual design capabilities, and experience in creating frictionless user experiences, concepts, and customer journeys.
Experience in wireframing and prototyping using tools like Figma /Zeppelin.
An ability to explain complex concepts and ideas in a simple and clear way to people from various backgrounds.
Enthusiastic about the small details and excited to keep pushing it until it's pixel-perfect, but also able to balance the trade-offs and work in short iterations.
Fluent in English - speaking and writing.

title: Senior Full Stack Engineer
subTitle: Hello Heart
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel\nHybrid
description:
About Hello Heart




Hello Heart is the only digital therapeutics company to focus exclusively on heart disease, the leading cause of death for U.S. adults. Through a connected device and mobile app that uses AI, behavioral science, and personalized digital coaching to drive lifestyle changes, Hello Heart empowers people to embrace healthier behavior, which can reduce the risks of high blood pressure and heart disease. It also helps users catch blood pressure readings that are extremely high and encourages them to talk to their doctor to identify potential risk in time. Validated in peer-reviewed studies and trusted by leading Fortune 500 companies, Hello Heart is easy to use and works alongside an employer’s benefits ecosystem. Founded in 2013, Hello Heart is a member of the American Heart Association’s Innovators’ Network and is part of the CVS Health Point Solutions Management program. Hello Heart is backed by leading VCs including Stripes, Khosla Ventures, IVP, Blue Run and Resolute. Visit www.helloheart.com for more information.




About The Role




We are growing! This past year we tripled our customers and revenue. Due to hyper-growth, we seek a Full Stack Engineer who will join our engineering team and take a lead role in the development and maintenance of Hello Heart's mobile app - the core of our business.




As part of our small team of experienced and highly talented developers, you will be working on a product that actually saves lives by taking lead work with a variety of technologies and projects.




The position includes working closely with the Product, Design and Data Science teams, taking full ownership of your work from conception to post-deployment, while continuously learning and evaluating cutting edge technologies in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.




Our Technologies stack: React Native, Redux, React JS, Scala, Play, Microservices, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, MongoDB, Redis, Postgres, Spark, Elasticsearch, Kafka, and more.




Areas Of Responsibility




Develop code that is used daily around the world and actually saves lives!
Work with our data science team on implementing their algorithms into our new and upcoming data driven solutions.
Collaborate with Product Managers, Experience Designers and Data Engineers on all aspects of product development: strategy, brainstorming, user research, design, execution, AB testing, and iteration.
Take part in making a major difference in our team and influence our technology stack.
Join a great team of people passionate about technology and doing good to the world.




Qualifications




4+ years of professional experience in mobile software development preferable React Native.
BS degree in Computer Science or similar, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience in one of the following: Scala, Java, Ruby, Python, Go.
Experience with databases Postgres, MongoDB, etc - Advantage.
Familiar with cloud-based deployment: AWS, Docker, Serverless, etc - Advantage




Hello Heart has a positive, diverse, and supportive culture - we look for people who are collaborative, creative, and courageous. Oh, and if you want to see some recent evidence of the fun things we do at Hello Heart, check out our Instagram page.

title: Staff Frontend Engineer
subTitle: Upbound
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel\nRemote
description:
As a Staff Frontend Engineer at Upbound, you’ll be responsible for building the applications and experiences that customers of Upbound Cloud will directly interact with. As the face and first touch-point for users of the product, you will be tasked with building the experience that will delight and impress them, thereby contributing meaningfully and tangibly to the overall business and product.

The Upbound Universal Cloud Console puts this power at the users’ fingertips. By leveraging Upbound’s hosted control plane service, platform operators can offload complex administration of their Crossplane clusters and spend more time crafting multi-cloud APIs that make it easy for application developers to claim critical pieces of infrastructure for their work.

The Upbound Marketplace is the one-stop shop for the Crossplane community to discover, install, and publish their preferred packages for consumption. Whether they are Providers that capture new kinds of APIs for Crossplane to learn, or Configurations that allow you to deploy a reference architecture in minutes, the Marketplace is a central hub of activity for software vendors and end users alike.

This is just a sneak peek of what we are building.

In this role, you will be…

Designing and building the end user facing experiences of our Upbound Cloud service
Interacting with backend service REST and GraphQL APIs to retrieve application data and build dynamic visualizations and experiences
Optimizing and troubleshooting Single Page Applications (SPA) across a diverse variety of environments (browsers, mobile, etc.)
Reporting and fixing bugs in private and public projects
Designing and authoring test plans, unit testing, and integration testing to ensure high quality code that is free of regressions
Mentoring more junior members of the team and providing high quality constructive feedback on pull requests and design documents
Partnering with other disciplines and roles on a shared mission, demonstrating highly effective communication and collaboration skills
Supporting the full project lifecycle - discovery, analysis, architecture, design, documentation, building, migration, automation, and production-readiness


You are a good fit if you have...

Written lots of code and automation in modern languages (TypeScript preferred)
Designed reliable, beautiful, and delightful to use Single Page Applications (SPA) with a variety of frameworks (React is ideal)
Written test plans and implemented test cases to keep your code to a high standard of quality, using libraries such as Jest and react-testing-library, as well as end-to-end testing frameworks like Cypress
Followed CSS best practices for designing responsive user interfaces, such as Flex and Grid
Managed application state with libraries such as Redux
Optimized the packaging and deployment of your applications with bundling tools like Webpack
Internalized how important owning the “face” of the product is and the effect it has on customer experience
Architected and deployed highly scaled and reliable applications in multiple environments
Incorporated modern operational and application delivery tools and methodologies into your production deployment workflows, like CI/CD, IaC, and GitOps


It is a plus if…

You have worked in a startup and distributed/remote team before, and understand the unique challenges of a startup environment.
You have have been responsible for deploying/managing workloads running on Kubernetes in production
You have a history of speaking at technology conferences, blogging/writing technical articles, and/or contributing to a popular open source project

title: Front End Team Leader

title: Software Development Team Leader
subTitle: PTC
description:
Our world is transforming, and PTC is leading the way. Our software brings the physical and digital worlds together, enabling companies to improve operations, create better products, and empower people in all aspects of their business.




Our people make all the difference in our success. Today, we are a global team of nearly 7,000 and our main objective is to create opportunities for our team members to explore, learn, and grow – all while seeing their ideas come to life and celebrating the differences that make us who we are and the work we do possible.




PTC, a global provider of CAD, PLM, IoT and AR solutions, is are looking for a strong Software Engineer to join one of our teams at the development center in Herzliya, Israel.You will be part of a global group – The Illustrate team, responsible for the development and maintenance of Creo Illustrate, and advanced product illustration application for creating product diagrams.If you are curious, collaborative, and motivated, and would like to be part of an exceptional team of experts, then your place is with us!As part of your job at PTC, you will:provide top notch illustration software to PTCs customers.plan the contents for each sprint, manage the day-to-day work towards a successful release,handle escalated customer incidents,set goals and manage the individual and technical growth of team members,take part in the definition of the work procedures and tools.Requirements:An experienced team lead (2 years or higher), managing a team of at least 3 persons.Hands on development experience with C/C++, 4 years or more.Leading a full release cycleCommunication with customer support, product management and external teams




Life at PTC is about more than working with today’s most cutting-edge technologies to transform the physical world. It’s about showing up as you are and working alongside some of today’s most talented industry leaders to transform the world around you.




If you share our passion for problem-solving through innovation, you’ll likely become just as passionate about the PTC experience as we are. Are you ready to explore your next career move with us?




]]>

title: Senior Full Stack Developer (UI)
subTitle: Artlist
description:
Artlist is a fast-growing creative technology company providing video creators with high-quality music, sound effects, footage and digital assets for video, as well as powerful video and image editing software. With our revolutionary license and cutting-edge creative tools, we’re on the fast track to becoming the ultimate 360 degree solution for video creators.

Today, Artlist is the go-to licensing provider for creators in over 160 countries. Among our 16M clients are Google, Apple, Nike, Coca-Cola, Ikea, Mercedes, Samsung, Wix, Netflix, Dior and many more.

Artlist consists of 4 products:

Artlist.io, a royalty-free music and SFX platform
Artgrid.io, a curated stock footage platform
MotionArray.com, an all-in-one marketplace for creators that offers video templates, presets, music, SFX, stock footage, motion graphics and stock photos
FXhome, a cutting-edge video, VFX and image editing software



We're looking for a Full Stack Developer to join our amazing and growing R&D department. As a Full Stack Developer you'll utilize your knowledge of software development to help build next generation web applications. You'll also work alongside other engineers and developers in order to bring the product to the next level.




Wake up for this:

Develop full stack web applications with the latest technologies, focusing on the frontend
Work in small groups with other talented engineers to create visionary UI/UX
Improve the user experience across Artlist's platform
Share your expertise with the team by putting your ego aside
Own and manage all phases of the software development lifecycle (planning, design, implementation, deployment and support)
Collaborate effectively with product managers, designers, engineers, stakeholders, and vendors on projects
Communicate technical ideas and set direction on projects with a focus on solving business challenges
Lead by example, take action and get things done







Requirements:

4+ years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer
Deep experience in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Node.JS
Strong knowledge of Javascript
Great problem-solving skills
Curious and motivated learner
Clear communicator - you are concise and articulate in speech and writing




Nice to have:

Experience with React
Experience with state management (Redux / MobX / other)
Knowledge of building Restful API services
Experience in delivering performant applications
Interest in UI design

title: Software Team Leader
subTitle: ZipRecruiter
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
description:
We offer a hybrid work environment. Most US-based positions can also be performed remotely (any exceptions will be noted in the Minimum Qualifications below.)
For Israel-based positions, we encourage working from our Saarona, Tel Aviv office a few days a week, meeting your colleagues, and having a flexible work environment.
Our Mission:
To actively connect people to their next great opportunity.
Who We Are:
ZipRecruiter is a leading online employment marketplace. Powered by AI-driven smart matching technology, the company actively connects millions of all-sized businesses and job seekers through innovative mobile, web, and email services, as well as through partnerships with the best job boards on the web. ZipRecruiter has the #1 rated job search app on iOS & Android.
Summary :
Our team has a unique opportunity to work on applications at scale, serving millions of jobseekers and tens of thousands of customers. We’re working on building an efficient marketplace of jobseekers and employers and need full-stack engineers and Software Team Leader to build fast, scalable, and effective applications that help connect people to their next job. We provide an essential service and have a thriving business as a result.
Our business is complex and we’re looking for Software Team Leader who can own entire (or even multiple) product lines, drive business value while investing in their team’s/tech stack’s health, and coach engineers to build a strong culture of excellence, ownership, and personal and professional growth.
Responsibilities:

Own the mission, execution, morale, and code quality of your team
Partner effectively with product managers to maintain and execute against the product roadmap
Serve as a force multiplier for your team by removing roadblocks, identifying and implementing process improvements, and delegating effectively
Actively build community and culture throughout the engineering organization
Continually research and implement management best practices, including providing frequent, actionable, constructive feedback to team members
Help drive the innovation and evolution of ZipRecruiter

Qualifications:

5+ years of experience in software development with at least 2 years of management experience
Strong track record of delivering high-quality software while leading teams of 3 to 10 engineers
Demonstrated ability to lead through influence and collaboration rather than pure authority
Ability to make key decisions in a timely manner while simultaneously weighing the needs and input of multiple stakeholders
Strong written and verbal communication ,with a bias toward action and follow-through

As part of our team you’ll enjoy:

Competitive compensation
Exceptional benefits package

ZipRecruiter is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or genetics.
Privacy Notice: For information about ZipRecruiter's collection and processing of job applicant personal data for this job, please see our Privacy Notice at: https://www.ziprecruiter.com/careers/job-applicant-privacy-notice

title: Senior Fronted Engineer
subTitle: Quotient Technology Inc.
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel\nHybrid
description:
Quotient is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity, value inclusion, and foster belonging within our teams. We strongly encourage individuals of all backgrounds, race, national origin, sex, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, religion, marital and parental status, medical conditions, citizenship, and individuals with different and special abilities to apply. If you need reasonable accommodations throughout the recruitment process, please let us know.

At Quotient we are transforming shopping to make life better. To do so, we are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to our team!

As a Senior Frontend Developer you will play a vital role in building cutting edge products. You will be expected to lead the engineering architecture and implementation, and maintain a high standard of Code and testing.

What You'll Do

Collaborate with the product team to understand the task requirements
Plan and lead the Engineering designs
Write well-designed, elegant, testable and efficient code
Ensure designs are in compliance with specifications
Refactor existing code, from time to time, to improve maintainability
Explore technologies and architectural changes to improve performance
Mentor other team members and support their professional growth


What Will You Bring

BS.c in computer science or Software Engineering or equivalent experience
At least 5 Years of software development experience
3 years of experience with Angular/React/Vue
3 years of experience with Typescript language
Experience with unit testing methodologies and frameworks such as Karma/Jest/Jasmine
Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal
Ability to effectively present information to internal and external associates
Demonstrated ability to take initiative and ownership with a focus on continuous improvement
Demonstrated ability to comprehend, analyze, and interpret product requirements
Order and attention to details
Strong self-management skills


Competitive Advantage

Experience working with Agile/SCRUM methodologies
Experience with RXjs library
Experience with Google Maps in high scale


LIFE AT QUOTIENT

We look for people with the skills and passion to thrive at a company where innovation is the norm, collaboration is paramount, and fun is always part of the mix! Come join our amazing team!

Integrity - We do the right thing, no exceptions.

Customer Service - We are obsessed with our customers, internal and external.

Teamwork - We work with trust and respect, treating our company as it was our own.

Innovation - We look for better ways to do everything, never settling for the status quo.

Sustainable Growth - We constantly look for ways to grow the business more efficiently.

Q-crew Perks And Benefits

At Quotient, we want you to have a healthy, rewarding, balanced and meaningful experience – both at work and in life. From traditional medical coverage to flexible time off to helping you save for your future, we’re committed to providing you the best benefits.

About Quotient

Quotient (NYSE: QUOT) is the leading digital media and promotions technology company that creates cohesive omnichannel brand-building and sales-driving opportunities to deliver valuable outcomes for advertisers, retailers and consumers. The Quotient platform is powered by exclusive consumer spending data, location intelligence and purchase intent data to reach millions of shoppers daily and deliver measurable, incremental sales. Quotient partners with leading advertisers and retailers, including Clorox, Procter & Gamble, General Mills, Unilever, Albertsons Companies, CVS, Dollar General and Peapod Digital Labs, a company of Ahold Delhaize USA. Quotient is headquartered in Salt Lake City, Utah, and has offices across the US as well as in Bangalore, Paris, London and Tel Aviv. For more information visit www.quotient.com

title: Senior Backend Engineer, R&D
subTitle: Axonius
description:
Axonius is the cybersecurity asset management platform that gives organizations a comprehensive asset inventory, uncovers gaps, and automatically validates and enforces policies. Deployed in minutes, the Axonius cyber asset attack surface management (CAASM) solution integrates with hundreds of data sources to give customers the confidence to control complexity by mitigating threats, navigating risk, decreasing incidents, automating response actions, and informing business-level strategy. Hundreds of customers worldwide like The New York Times, Schneider Electric, and AB InBev trust Axonius to control complexity.




Headquartered in New York, New York, Axonius employs over 500 people worldwide and achieved unicorn status in early 2021. Axonius has been recognized with the Great Place to Work Certification™, was named one of Fortune’s 2021 Best Small and Medium Workplaces™, and was named to Dun’s Best Start Up Companies to Work for Over 100 Employees. Axonius was also named to the 2021 Forbes Cloud 100 list of the top 100 private SaaS companies in the world and has been cited as the fastest growing cybersecurity company in history by revenue. Most recently, Axonius has been named to Inc. magazine's 2022 Best Workplaces list.




We are growing rapidly and are looking for superstars to join our rocketship.

As part of our rapid growth we are looking for a Senior Backend Developer to join us!




Responsibilities:




Be a part of the Axonius R&D team, implementing new and exciting features, end-to-end, along with the product team
Research solutions for challenging problems
Architectural and technological research
Working with the best techies and professionals




Requirements:




At least 5 years as a backend developer
Highly experienced with Python
Understanding of fundamental design principles for building a scalable application
Experience with MongoDB
Background in Cybersecurity
Deep understanding of networks
Can-do approach




A little more about Axonius:




We are a remote-first culture. We have offices in New York and in Tel Aviv, but the majority of our employees are working from home across the US and Internationally.
Our people aren’t just great professionals, they are great people. We are all here to support each other, ready to help and do what’s best for the entire company.
Focus on Career growth. We love seeing our people grow into new roles and work hard to ensure everyone sees and can realize a long term career path here at Axonius




At Axonius we support a diverse and inclusive workplace and believe in equal employment opportunity. We welcome people of different backgrounds, experiences, abilities and perspectives, regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, age, sex, gender identity, national origin, sexual orientation, citizenship, marital status, disability, or Veteran status.

title: Full Stack Team Lead
subTitle: Via
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel\nOn-site
description:
We are looking for a Full-Stack Team Leader to join our R&D center in TLV. The position is to lead a Development team responsible for Via’s developers and QA analysts through the product life cycle, hands-on, and contribute directly to our cutting-edge technologies. You will be shaping the future of transportation, affecting tens of thousands of rides daily worldwide.

What You’ll Do

Be the full tech owner of your team’s products
Growing and mentoring your team members
Take end-to-end professional responsibility over your team’s Agile development life-cycle
Proactively build your team, recruiting and on-boarding
Be a hands-on developer in your team - designing, coding, and delivering features to production
Lead the team’s atmosphere and culture

Who You Are
BSc. Computer Science or similar.
4-5 years of professional experience in backend or full-stack development
2-3 years of experience as a web application developer in a hands-on technical leadership position
Independent, responsible, with a true desire to make an impact
Passionate about software engineering and constantly expanding your knowledge
An expert in balancing the trade-offs between technical and product priorities
Enjoys working with people
Driven by tough challenges, and producing reliable and scalable solutions
Enthusiastic about code quality, architecture, design, testing, and performance
Preferred experience (one or more) -
Cloud technologies: AWS, Docker, Serverless, etc.
Full stack development in: Python/JS

We’re Via, and we build technology that changes the way the world moves. We pioneered the TransitTech category to ensure that the future of transportation is shared, dynamic public mobility — the kind that reduces carbon emissions across congested cities, minimizes reliance on private cars, and provides everyone with accessible, efficient, and affordable ways of getting around.

With the addition of Remix into our portfolio, we created the first end-to-end TransitTech solution for cities and transit agencies, offering world-class software, service design, and operational expertise to fundamentally improve the way the world moves.

We’re committed to building and nurturing a team as diverse as the communities we serve. Bringing transportation equity to the world begins with championing equal opportunity in our own offices. All backgrounds, identities, and voices are welcomed and celebrated here.

Ready to join the ride?

title: Senior Software Engineer
subTitle: Proofpoint
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!




We're committed to bringing passion and customer focus to the business.




The Role




Design and develop a robust, scalable and sophisticated Cloud Apps Security Platform, which ingests and acts upon large scale of real time events.




We’re looking for an experienced Senior Software Developer to play a key role evolving the Data Protection Platform backend systems.




If you're




Passionate about helping customers solve their data protection needs
A resourceful and creative problem solver
Motivated to learn new technologies and immediately apply them to your work




This job is ideal for you.




Your day-to-day




Design and develop the backend of a distributed Micro-Services based system, deployed globally and serving other groups in the company.
Perform code reviews.
Work across the development organization to integrate between Frontend, Backend and endpoint agents.
Own critical production system components being used by clients around the world.
Coding in JavaScript and Working with NoSQL DBs like Elastic Search and DynamoDB.
Build and deploy applications and components in a cloud-based environment (AWS)
Working closely with the QA and DevOps team to monitor and support a critical production system used by clients around the world




What You Bring To The Team

If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

title: Frontend Team Lead, Foundation Team
subTitle: Fireblocks
description:
Fireblocks is one of the most well-funded and fastest-growing start-ups in the crypto and blockchain space. We’re on a mission to enable every business in the world to securely and easily support digital assets and cryptocurrencies.

Helping thousands of organizations securely mint, transfer, and store crypto.




About the Front-end Foundation Team:

Our customers interact with Fireblocks daily and their business is critically dependent on us. Our customers are advanced/power users of the platform.

The Front-end Foundation team is responsible for providing the best-in-class foundations and frameworks for the application and engineering teams. The team focuses on introducing new front-end solutions, dealing with complex performance challenges, and introducing FE architecture that evolves over time and allows teams to execute at speed and in full autonomy.




Your role:

We value individuals who are life-long learners, resourceful and passionate about constantly improving themselves, their team, and the products they work on.

Be passionate about the role, a team player with a can-do attitude.

We’re looking for an exceptional Front-end Foundation Team Lead who is highly proficient in building (hands-on) modern web applications and features from scratch.
Recruit, Lead, mentor, and grow a team of front-end seasoned professionals while fostering innovation and ownership across the team and company.
Profound knowledge in designing and implementing micro-frontend architecture.
You will be taking full ownership of the entire Front-end Infrastructure, of the Fireblocks distributed products.
Creating intuitive and easy-to-use APIs for all relevant Fireblocks products.
You will be required to lead and design scalable frontend frameworks that will allow various Fireblocks engineering teams to develop products with speed, quality, and efficiency.




Requirements:

At least 1-year of experience as a team lead.
Can consider Tech Leads/Sr. FE engineers that want to move to management.
At least 4+ years experience with React.
Experience with Micro frontend - a must.
A proactive approach with the ability to organize self and work effectively.
Team player




We are looking for the best talent to join our team, therefore if you believe you can do the role submit your CV!




Fireblocks is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran, or disability status.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
subTitle: Tenable
description:
We're a small, but growing, team that builds a unique security monitoring and management solution for industrial control systems and we’re looking for talented Front end Engineers to join our growing team in Tel Aviv.




Your Opportunity:




Growth and Development: As part of working on a small team, you'll have a broad scope and an opportunity to grow as a software engineer. You will team up with engineers to drive initiatives, define the architecture, and build new features.
Collaboration: Work closely with Product Managers, other engineers, and designers to continuously improve the product.
Creativity: We welcome engineers that are motivated and come up with their own ideas to help us build a better product.
Architecture & Design: Help with design decisions and the ability to understand and improve our performance and stability.

What you'll need:




At least 3 years of experience as a Front-end Developer - Preferably Angular Framework.
At least 3 years of experience with JavaScript and Css (experience with sass/less is advantage)
Experience with TypeScript
Knowledge of performance optimizations techniques in JavaScript and frontend framework
Excellent knowledge of browser troubleshooting and debugging practices and techniques
Sense of ownership and pride in your performance and its impact on company’s success
Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
Team player
Great interpersonal and communication skills

If you’ve reached this point in the job description and feel you’re still not sure if you should apply…Just do it! We know there are no perfect applicants. You may not have 100% of all those bullets listed above - and that’s okay. If you’re feeling like you’re not going to fit in with our teams - that’s not ok. We're One Tenable which means however you identify and whatever background you bring with you, we encourage you to submit an application if it’s a role you can be passionate about doing every day.

We’re committed to promoting Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) at Tenable - through all equal employment opportunity laws and regulations at the international, federal, state and local levels.

title: Frontend Architect
subTitle: Wix
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
description:
We Are

Wix’s Frontend Engineering group with an engineering culture that embraces cutting-edge technologies, TDD, performance and clean code for our highly scalable systems that support Wix’s over 200 million users. We work in small teams, follow agile work methods and use continuous integration and continuous delivery methodologies to run quickly while maintaining the high quality of our product.

We believe that architects (we call them guild masters) have to be 100% hands on developers. These are the professionals who spend most of their time helping to launch new products, solving architectural issues, and taking responsibility for recruiting, onboarding and mentoring new frontend developers. They are also an important part of the infrastructure team, which is responsible for creating tools that make developers more productive.

You Are

An exceptional frontend developer who always wants to know how things work. You’re on expert level when it comes to the latest JavaScript technologies (React, Angular, Vue, etc), tools (Babel, Webpack, Gulp) and languages (Typescript, ES6).

You’re a people person who loves sharing knowledge and best practices, and you’re an independent self learner, who’s also a great team player.

Got experience in Test Driven Development (TDD) and Continuous Delivery? That’s a bonus!

As a Frontend Architect, You Will

Be responsible for growing web and JavaScript technology.
Mentor new guild members.
Improve your skills and learn from top-notch engineers, while getting hands-on experience in Wix’s many teams.
Work on cutting-edge technologies and become an industry leader.
Write TDD and clean code.
Contribute to the engineering culture and methodologies of Wix.


About Wix

With over 30 different products, Wix makes it easy for anyone to succeed online. We build web creation tools and business solutions, mobile apps, payment processing technologies, as well as CRM and marketing tools that help our users in different business sectors and compete online. Our technologies are based on massive infrastructure required to securely and resiliently serve over 220 million users, and their visitors across the globe - instantly. Our scale is enormous, and our plans for the future are even bigger.

Wix’s product development teams work in a dev-centric culture, deploy code hundreds of times every day using advanced automation tools, and create methodologies that enable a fast-to-production environment. We operate in small highly-collaborative teams, but belong to professional groups called Guilds, dedicated to personal and professional growth.

We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer. Wix was built around the idea that everyone has the right to be successful, online. This same vision defines us as an employer: creating a work environment where everyone is welcome, and anyone has the right to succeed.

title: Software Team Lead
subTitle: Veev
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel\nOn-site
description:

title: Front-End Engineer
subTitle: HoneyBook
location: Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
description:
HoneyBook is the leading business and financial management platform for small business service providers and freelancers. By combining tools like billing, contracts and client communication, HoneyBook helps business owners get organized so they can provide top-tier service at every step. HoneyBook is trusted by service providers across the U.S. and Canada who have booked more than $5B in business on its platform. Every day at HoneyBook we are on a mission to empower the freelance economy to rise together, doing what they love.

Our award-winning culture is built on core values that drive everything we do, including putting people first. We know experience comes in many different forms, some visible on your resume, others not. No one candidate will be a 100% perfect match to our description, so if you thrive in a fast-paced, intellectually-charged environment and have similar experience to what we are looking for, we encourage you to apply. Did we mention we have 4.9 stars on Glassdoor?

Our team is growing and we’re looking for a talented engineer to join us.

Here are a few of the things you'll do...

As a Front-End engineer, you’ll be working on our product-development (ProDev) team. ProDev is composed of engineers, product managers and designers who work closely together with the ultimate goal of creating a seamless experience for HoneyBook’s customers.

You will be responsible for helping to craft the future of our service from a front-end, design-driven perspective. You will be working closely with people across engineering, product, and community to help develop an amazing experience for our customers.

Here’s What You’ll Need To Be Successful…

4+ years of experience working with JavaScript, HTML, CSS and interfacing with back-end languages
Experience working with JavaScript frameworks, such as Angular, React or Vue
A real passion for JS and clean code
Deep awareness of cross-browser quirks and responsive design
Strong aesthetic sense, commitment to pixel perfection and appreciation for UX
Enthusiasm for working with designers and product managers
Grasp of the big picture: HoneyBook’s on a mission to improve the way our users work and to revolutionize the entire events industry

The opportunity at HoneyBook is huge – our primary customers today are service-based small businesses and freelancers. Our company, like the members we serve, thrives on creativity and risk-taking; in eight years, we’ve become the biggest and the most widely recognized player in the small business and freelance space. To date, HoneyBook has raised $498M and is backed by investors such as Durable Capital Partners LP, Tiger Global Management, Battery Ventures, Zeev Ventures, 01 Advisors, Norwest Venture Partners, OurCrowd, and Citi Ventures.

Follow us on Medium and Instagram and catch the latest stories about HoneyBook. Read about what our employees are saying about us on Glassdoor.

Description




monday.com 's makers team is expanding and looking for a Makers Team Leader to join the team. If you consider yourself a maker - a continuously learning multidisciplinary builder who is passionate and experienced in creation and innovation - this could be your dream job!




We are in a mission to make people's work simpler, more productive, and enjoyable. The makers' team builds experimental products, interactive art, and games in order to make the office a more cool, smart, and fun place.




The makers team is a small yet skillfull team on a mission to build tomorrow's smart office based on the philosophy and technology ideated at monday.com . The team works like a startup within a startup. We use software, electronics, laser cutting, woodworking, 3d printing and many more tools in our day to day.




Our ideal candidate is a tech-savvy person who can lead our efforts in pioneering the “future of work” and executing it. You will take projects from initiation, design, and execution all the way to implementation, iteration, and optimization.




Before anything else, we're looking for an experienced software developer to join the team and lead all aspects related to software (web, desktop or devices). We have projects running on microcontrollers such as Arduino / ESP8266 / ESP32, on Raspberry Pi's, on PC's and macs, and on servers such as AWS and Google Cloud.




About The Role




Hands-on, solution-oriented & maker-grade software developer; ability to build product prototypes for problems no one else can
Create products employees need and love, focus on impact-driving efforts
Lead the creation of new products; iterate, adjust and optimize them, reaching successful, sticky products
Comprehensively evaluate the product you’re working on through qualitative methods
Shape and define the product strategy and define relevant KPIs
Identify potential problems and opportunities while making decisions and analyzing results
Lead a multidisciplinary team of Makers, consolidate different skill sets toward impact




Requirements




You are a Maker in your soul and experience with a strong technology background - full-stack software is a must (JS). Electronics, hardware, 3D printing, and other maker skills are an advantage.
You have the soul of an entrepreneur and a real passion for solving challenges hands-on
Experience in people management
You are analytical and experienced in working both with qualitative insights and quantitative data to drive product decisions.
You are a fast learner, adaptive, and thrive in a fast paced, ever-changing environment
You possess natural ownership abilities and entrepreneurial qualities - you’re self-driven and you feel comfortable motivating, leading, and making decisions
You have great interpersonal and communication skills
Stack: NodeJS, JS (vanilla, or framework of your choice), Also: Python, Bash, C++ (optional). hardware, woodworking, 3d printing, etc). Advantage - Experience working with Raspberry Pi or microcontrollers (Arduino / ESP32 / ESP8266)

Life at BrainPOP

What we do today directly impacts how teachers teach, and students learn. Our commitment to supporting and empowering teachers and students is reflected in our dedication to enhancing the lives of our employees—in and out of the office. We value Diversity & Inclusion, collaboration, and learning from multiple perspectives, and encourage people to bring their most authentic selves to work. title: Full Stack Tech Lead

Axonius is the cybersecurity asset management platform that gives organizations a comprehensive asset inventory, uncovers gaps, and automatically validates and enforces policies. Deployed in minutes, the Axonius cyber asset attack surface management (CAASM) solution integrates with hundreds of data sources to give customers the confidence to control complexity by mitigating threats, navigating risk, decreasing incidents, automating response actions, and informing business-level strategy. Headquartered in New York, New York, Axonius employs over 600 people worldwide and achieved unicorn status in early 2021. Axonius has been recognized with the Great Place to Work Certification™, was named one of Fortune’s 2021 Best Small and Medium Workplaces™, and was named to Dun’s Best Start Up Companies to Work for Over 100 Employees. Most recently, Axonius was also named to the 2021 and 2022 Forbes Cloud 100 list of the top 100 private SaaS companies in the world, as well as named to Inc. magazine's 2022 Best Workplaces and has been cited as the fastest growing cybersecurity company in history by revenue.




We are growing rapidly and are looking for superstars to join our rocket ship.

Can do approach

Hands-on experience with relational databases
Experience with writing automated tests
Computer science or an equivalent degree

A little more about Axonius:




We are a remote-first culture. We have offices in New York and in Tel Aviv, but the majority of our employees are working from home across the US and Internationally.

Focus on Career growth. We love seeing our people grow into new roles and work hard to ensure everyone sees and can realize a long term career path here at Axonius.




At Axonius we support a diverse and inclusive workplace and believe in equal employment opportunity. About Hello Heart




Hello Heart is the only digital therapeutics company to focus exclusively on heart disease, the leading cause of death for U.S. adults. Through a connected device and mobile app that uses AI, behavioral science, and personalized digital coaching to drive lifestyle changes, Hello Heart empowers people to embrace healthier behavior, which can reduce the risks of high blood pressure and heart disease. It also helps users catch blood pressure readings that are extremely high and encourages them to talk to their doctor to identify potential risk in time. Validated in peer-reviewed studies and trusted by leading Fortune 500 companies, Hello Heart is easy to use and works alongside an employer’s benefits ecosystem. Founded in 2013, Hello Heart is a member of the American Heart Association’s Innovators’ Network and is part of the CVS Health Point Solutions Management program. Hello Heart is backed by leading VCs including Stripes, Khosla Ventures, IVP, Blue Run and Resolute. Visit www.helloheart.com for more information.

BSc\BA in Computer Science, or any related degree

title: Web Developer
subTitle: R2Net Inc - JamesAllen.com
description:
R2Net Inc. is an international software company, owned by the world's largest retailer of diamond jewelry, Signet Jewelers (NYSE SIG). What began as a modest trading network to sell diamonds has steadily transformed into a robust e-commerce and supply chain platform that connects the entire span of the diamond industry’s ecosystem, including manufacturers, retailers and consumers. R2Net owns and operates three distinct brands, James Allen, Segoma and Brio Animation Studio.

JamesAllen.com is the fastest-growing online retailer of engagement rings and loose diamonds, allowing customers to personalize and order engagement rings and other fine jewelry entirely online.




What’s It Like To Work For Us?

At R2Net, we’re proud of our unique and diverse work environment, striving to employ people from many different backgrounds and cultures. Every team member has a voice within the company and contributes to our overall development. We provide ample opportunities for growth and cultivate a collaborative and entrepreneurial approach to our day-to-day work. Additionally, it is very important to us to promote a strong work-life balance for each of our employees.




Responsibilities:

Maintain and improve existing sites as needed.

Plan, design, and develop brand-new web features or apps from scratch.

Be ready to acquire an in-depth understanding of our technical challenges.

Be responsible, deliver on time, and own your projects.

Collaborate effectively within a multidisciplinary team of developers, researchers, product managers, designers, sales, and other stakeholders.




Requirements:

At least 3 years of experience developing web applications with React.js And Redux.

Understanding of the modern web and surrounding technologies

Detail-oriented with an emphasis on performance and UX.

Experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

Open source experience and/or public portfolio - Advantage.

Organized with the ability to assume control of complex processes.

High level of English.

Our story




With over 98 million active users across 25 countries, here at Just Eat Takeaway.com, we're a global food tech company, connecting our customers from Amsterdam to Auckland with the food they love.




As a growing business, we're searching for opportunities to perfect our processes and implement methodologies that help our teams to thrive locally and globally. That's where you come in!




All About The Role




As our Full Stack Team Lead, you play a key role in optimizing all of our 10bis.co.il brand interfaces. Interfaces for consumers, business partners, restaurants, and the different operations teams.




You're responsible for a range of areas, including internal and external APIs, client infrastructure, integrations, and much more.




Your interpersonal skills will also be key, as we're counting on you to coach, motivate and inspire a development squad of 4-8 team members.




As Our Team Lead, You Will Also




Communicate project requirements and specifications to the team
Grow the team by recruiting new members
Create work plans & schedules for software developers
Build robust and scalable software components & services
Identify areas for improvement in our product architecture and design methodologies
Collaborate with team members and a wide range of other stakeholders
Take a flexible, proactive, and analytical approach to your work




Can you deliver…

1+ years of experience in managing a Software Development team (4+ members),

Here is our offer




Here at JET, we offer our colleagues the chance to develop and grow alongside top talent in one of the world's leading food delivery companies. By providing a creative, dynamic and innovative environment, we empower our people and give them the ingredients for success.




Ready to join us as a Full Stack Team Leader? Click Apply Now and send us your CV!




Diversity, Inclusion & Belonging.
